name: cisco-qms
description: Production-ready QMS for Cisco UCCX 15, MediaSense 11.5, CCP 15

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/api && npm run test -w apps/web
